scripts.script_content: Now, I wonder if folks out there agree that a good man really is hard for women like the one in this song you know what they say about men being unreliable! Here's Cass Daley with her tune on just how difficult it can be finding someone worthy of trust.

You know, there's just something hopeful and innocent about this song title "A Kiss to Build a Dream Upon". It makes me wonder if dreams really can be built on such tender moments between two people. And who better than Satchmo himself, Louis Armstrong, to bring that dreamy feeling alive with his trumpet?

I wonder if there are any vault dwellers out in the wasteland tonight, tuning into Appalachia Radio for some much needed respite from their harsh existence. Here to provide that escape is none other than clarinet legend himself, Artie Shaw with his wistful take on A Room With a View.

You know, it seems like whenever we reconnect through the radio waves out here in Appalachia Radio land after all these songs of love and loss on our playlist today this next one always feels especially poignant. Here are The Ink Spots with their beautiful harmonies telling a story that's been left behind… Address Unknown.

Now I ask you, does a tune ever get your toes tapping quite like this one? Letting loose and having some fun that seems to be the gist of what? Fats is telling us here. So grab an umbrella on a sunny day or dance in the drizzle with Ain't Misbehavin'.

Ladies and gentlemen, are you tired of settling for less than perfect in love? Well this song speaks straight from the heart about that eternal quest. Here's talented singer Cass Daley with her hit 'A Good?

Ladies and gentlemen, the sweet serenade of Satchmo never fails to soothe my soul. When he croons about chasing dreams built on tender kisses… well, it stirs something deep within me, reminding us all that love can be our greatest fantasy made real. Here's Louis Armstrong with A Kiss to Build a Dream On.

What is it about the quiet moments that make our hearts flutter, dear listeners? Is there something special in those whispered conversations and secret glances between lovers? Here now with his clarinet voice to paint this scene for us… It's none other than Artie Shaw as he serenades you tonight under A Room With a View.
The sweet, melancholic harmonies of "Address Unknown" from the legendary group The Ink Spots transport us to a place where love letters go unanswered and hearts remain hopeful despite distance.

Ladies and gentlemen, I've got a real swingin' tune for you tonight. This one here is about dancing the night away without a care in the world ain't no trouble at all when life gets you movin' to that rhythm! Here's Fats Waller with Ain't Misbehavin'.
